ovdesc.p: This screen is used to authorise or reject the payments, inputted or amended through PP.DIRECT.DEBIT screen.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.AUTHDIRECTDEBIT
All the fields except RejectDescription are 'No Input' fields.

Shows the Audit details of the payment from the 1st life cycle of payment process to current step. Defaulted from POR.HISTORYLOG.

Show each record in the PaymentOrder.HistoryLog as a separate line on the screen listed in chronological order. Each line contains the History Time Stamp, Event Type and Event Description (each value is delimited/separated on the screen from the other values to improve readability). The first activity in the life-cycle of the payment is shown on the top of the audit trail. If the operator scrolls down he will see the events closer to the current time. This forces the operator to go through the entire audit trail.
